scene_0: Signs with directions are shown. A girl is walking down the street
scene_1: The signs change to have poor contrast. The woman now looks confused. She looks at a navigation app on her phone.
scene_2: The app has a button with low contrast that changes to become clear
scene_3: An older man on a sofa is looking at a tablet. He goes to read a message on his mobile phone.
scene_4: Sun glares on the phone but the text is still readable.
scene_5: The woman from earlier, arrives at the destination using the mobile app.
